summary: Phase 3 Member Detail & Timeline Page UI/UX Redesign Testing - Comprehensive frontend testing completed. All major features working correctly including responsive header, timeline colored dots, date circles, card borders, status badges, and full-width timeline. Minor implementation detail found in profile photo responsive classes.

backend_issues.notes: Backend APIs working correctly. Member detail and care events endpoints functioning as expected.

design_issues.issue: Profile photo responsive classes implementation - size prop uses fixed 'xl' (w-32 h-32) instead of responsive classes (w-20 sm:w-32). Additional className prop with responsive classes is passed but may not override Avatar component's size classes.
design_issues.impact: Visual sizing works correctly on different breakpoints, but implementation doesn't match exact specification in requirements (80px mobile, 128px desktop via w-20 sm:w-32 classes).
design_issues.recommendation: Consider adding responsive size options to MemberAvatar component (e.g., size='responsive-xl') or ensure className prop properly overrides default size classes.

passed_tests: ‚úì Login flow with campus selection
‚úì Navigation to Members page
‚úì Member Detail page loading
‚úì Responsive header with profile photo (visually correct, implementation detail noted)
‚úì Clickable phone link (tel:) with icon
‚úì Clickable email link (mailto:) with icon
‚úì Engagement badge display ('Aktif')
‚úì Add Care Event button responsive (w-full sm:w-auto)
‚úì Timeline colored dots (Teal: 6, Pink: 2, Purple: 1) - 9 total
‚úì Date circles showing DD format (e.g., '15')
‚úì Date circles showing MMM format (e.g., 'NOV')
‚úì Card left borders with colors matching dot colors (teal, pink, purple)
‚úì Status badges inline with event type ('Completed' in green)
‚úì Full-width timeline without Card container wrapper
‚úì Timeline vertical line positioned correctly (left-6 sm:left-7)
‚úì Member info card responsive grid (2 cols mobile, 3 cols tablet, 4 cols desktop)
‚úì No horizontal scroll on mobile (390px)
‚úì No horizontal scroll on tablet (768px)
‚úì No horizontal scroll on desktop (1024px)
‚úì Tabs switching correctly (Timeline, Grief, Accident/Illness, Aid)
‚úì Completed/ignored items have 60% opacity on card content
‚úì Dates and dots remain vibrant (100% opacity) while cards are dimmed
‚úì Three dots menu button present on each timeline card
‚úì Bilingual support working (Indonesian text: 'Tambah Kejadian Perawatan', 'Kontak Terakhir', 'Aktif', 'Bantuan Keuangan')
‚úì Responsive behavior at all breakpoints (390px, 768px, 1024px, 1920px)
‚úì Touch-friendly button sizing (Add Care Event button full-width on mobile)
‚úì Desktop sidebar navigation visible
‚úì Mobile bottom navigation visible

items.item: Consider refactoring MemberAvatar component to support responsive sizing natively (e.g., add 'responsive-xl' size option that applies w-20 sm:w-32 classes)
items.current_behavior: Profile photo uses fixed 'xl' size (w-32 h-32) with additional className prop for responsive classes that may not override properly
items.expected_behavior: Profile photo should use w-20 (80px) on mobile and sm:w-32 (128px) on desktop as specified in requirements
items.note: Visual appearance is correct across breakpoints, this is an implementation detail refinement

desktop_1920x1080.timeline: Colored dots (teal, purple) below date circles

conclusion: Phase 3 Member Detail & Timeline page redesign is successfully implemented and working correctly. All major features including responsive header, timeline colored dots, date circles, card borders, status badges, and full-width timeline are functioning as expected. One minor implementation detail noted regarding profile photo responsive classes, but visual appearance is correct. No critical or high-priority issues found. Ready for production.
